text:
If you starting with Deep learning and want a free and easy learning resource for practicing Deep learning concepts — start using the Watson API — I think its free for now. You need to know REST API calls using curl commands.

Lets start training a Classifier Algorithm with [set of Images and Class label for each Image] and create a new Image recognizing — Classifier model.

You only need Images- jpg or png files and label each Image.

Our Objective — Once the Image classifier Model is created, the new Model should identify the Image file you submit as Input and return the Correct Label for the Image file.

Once the Classifier Model is created and tested by You, please deploy the Model for production use and your Apps can use this Model using REST API.

Please watch these Videos for starting with Deep learning — very simple
title: Deep learning : Train image Classifier using Watson API — simple as cakewalk :)

text:
Cognitive & AI — market is predicted to be $47 Billion by 2020

**(figure might be not exact)

Look at the Global companies investing on Machine learning.

All the Global Conferences run by Microsoft, Amazon and Google are completely immersed with Cognitive and Machine learning sessions.

Last 2 years, conferences had Cloud and Big data sessions, but this is changing rapidly.

As per some Experts, by year 2018–50% of all new Applications will have Cognitive Intelligence.

What is the Domain of Cognitive ?
title: $47 Billion in Year 2020 → Predicting the Job/Services market for Machine learning and AI ?

text:
Graphcore comes out of stealth mode and announces $30m in funding to accelerate AI and machine learning.

Google AI invents its own cryptographic algorithm; no one knows how it works

Neural networks seem good at devising crypto methods; less good at codebreaking.

Carnegie Mellon made a special pair of glasses that lets you steal a digital identity

Your face is quickly becoming a key to the digital world. Computers, phones, and even online stores are starting to use your face as a password. But new research from Carnegie Mellon University shows that facial recognition software is far from secure.

DeepMind and Blizzard to release StarCraft II as an AI research environment

DeepMind is collaboration with Blizzard Entertainment to open up StarCraft II to AI and ML researchers around the world.

Software Dreams Up New Molecules in Quest for Wonder Drugs

Ingesting a heap of drug data allows a machine-learning system to suggest alternatives humans hadn’t tried yet.
title: — Issue #14 –
